abstract: Credit card companies are increasingly marketing a variety of cards that are a hybrid of credit, debit and gift cards to teenagers.
snippet: Credit card companies are increasingly marketing a variety of cards that are a hybrid of credit, debit and gift cards to teenagers.
lead_paragraph: HERE we are, a nation deeply in debt. All told, America’s adults are on the hook for well over $2 trillion, and more than a third of that is credit card debt. Given the circumstances, what is the best way to prevent our young people from skidding into debt?

headline.main: Cards Train Teenagers to Use Plastic
